thread.title: Does Theresa May have anything else to offer Britain beyond Brexit?
thread.title_full: Does Theresa May have anything else to offer Britain beyond Brexit?

author: Simon Heffer
title: Does Theresa May have anything else to offer Britain beyond Brexit?
text:
H aving had the Brexit vote, and the Brexit White Paper , it is time the rest of politics resumed. Even those of us who thought the main thing wrong with the United Kingdom was its subservience to anti-democratic and corrupt rule from Brussels understood that more needed to change to cement the prosperous, secure and civilised country of our dreams. Some ministers understand this too: but we seek evidence of any serious vision.
In recent weeks this column has highlighted the most urgent problems. Our defences are pitifully inadequate. Our health service is teetering, partly because provision of care for the elderly is a national disgrace and the NHS is having to step in. Transport and infrastructure are unequal to our growing population. Immigration from outside the EU remains badly controlled. Our farmers wonder what will happen once they lose their EU subsidies. The Tory core vote is outraged...
